channel.title: Best phone /contract
channel.description:
I would like to know what's the best deal you can get out of U.S phone companies for
[ul][li]Texting[/li] [li]Minutes[/li] [li]Video Camera[/li] [li]Good for music[/li] [li]Cost of the contract for a phone[/li] [li]The look of the phone[/li][/ul]
I've seen some of the ugliest phones from Nextel and the worst features imo so I'm ruling that out ( unless you otherwise think so ). Planning to get a phone soon and also what do YOU have right now that suits you currently?

item.title: Best phone /contract
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

$40.00/m is what I pay, but I use a family plan and that is added on top. If you go to the att website it will show you a plan you can customize.

Read full topic

item.title: Best phone /contract
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

[quote=“ThAt0n36Uy, post:20, topic:242164”][quote author=io9 link=topic=318543.msg2526102#msg2526102 date=1226207514]
AT&T. Media Max Package.

unltd texting, internets, and cellular video.
[/quote]
+1

I have the unlimited media package as well, and with the BlackJack II being only $18.00 now with a 2 year contract, it’s an awesome deal. Or the Samsung Epix which is a BlackJack II with a touch screen. I really like the Tilt as well, touchscreen, and full qwerty keyboard.[/quote]
How much is the contract? /month

Read full topic

Full Internet
unlimited NFL live

well basically… unlimited everything for a little under 100/month
